snippet.title: From Shadows - EXPERIENCE THE HUNT TRAILER
snippet.description:
When the night falls, two unlikely heroes emerge. A vicious WEREWOLF and a cunning VAMPIRE - creatures of the dark born of anger and blood are the last hope for a world taken over by black magic. Led by a mysterious sage, Cornelius, they’ll have to face hellish hordes of demons and fight through 21 sprawling levels before they can defeat the ULTIMATE EVIL!

FIND FROM SHADOWS ON STEAM:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/582920/From_Shadows

🧛🧛🧛
From Shadows is an action game blending the style of fast-paced platformers and beat’em ups. The menacing gothic atmosphere and foreboding music build tension, while the hand-drawn graphics give shape to unimaginable horrors straight from hell. This indie title offers option for solo play as well as cooperative split-screen (taking full advantage of both keyboards and controllers) and lets you publish your scores on global leaderboards.
Unleash your inner beast and step out of the shadows!

FEATURES:
🦇 split-screen cooperative gameplay
🦇 2 unlikely heroes - a vicious WEREWOLF and a cunning VAMPIRE
🦇 12 unique, upgradeable skills
🦇 24 menacing enemy types
🦇 towering bosses straight from hell 
🦇 21 sprawling levels
🦇 hand-drawn artwork 
🦇 day & night cycle
🦇 leaderboards and achievements
🦇 full keyboard+mouse and controller support
